N.description: Number of columns in the output.  If N is not specified, a square array is returned (N = len(x)).

increasing.description: Order of the powers of the columns.  If True, the powers increase from left to right, if False (the default) they are reversed.  New in version 1.9.0.

out.description: Vandermonde matrix.  If increasing is False, the first column is x^(N-1), the second x^(N-2) and so forth. If increasing is True, the columns are x^0, x^1, ..., x^(N-1).
